[b][color=white]May 2020 - Member of the Month[/color][/b]
May 2020 MoTM is [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1341148][color=#2D7E52][b]Herbert[/b][/color][/url], congrats![i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6083723] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]HF API v2 Beta[/color][/b]
After asking for feedback (still accepting ideas and suggestions), we've now got an updated API to mess with. Check it out and take advantage of it.[i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6083719] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]HF Phishing Attempts[/color][/b]
Watch out for phishing attempts, Hack Forums is not exempt from them. Verify the URL each time you enter in your password or anything else sensitive.[i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6063789] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2331053][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/notablethreads-mix.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Informational Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6083163][color=#FFFFFF]SpaceX launch success![/color][/url] - [mention=1255039]
NASA & SpaceX have partnered up to make history, this time they are sending two astronauts into orbit, this is the first time since the retirement of the shuttles nine years ago that an American crew has made the journey from US territory. They are heading to the ISS (International Space Station).

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6082643][color=#FFFFFF]Trump signs executive order targeting Twitter after fact-checking row[/color][/url] - [mention=279955]
Donald Trump is back in the news this week because he got censored on Twitter and is now enforcing a new law to stop freedom of speech since he thinks that twitter did wrong in censoring what he said. This was all because Trump posted a tweet that wasn't 100% true and twitter fact-checked the tweet and it proved him wrong.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Entertaining Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6083116][color=#FFFFFF]What phone do you guys currently use?[/color][/url] - [mention=777]
Phones we all have one. Some of us even have two, but Cooligan is asking members of the forum what phone they have and pretty much why they have that phone. Everyone has there own opinion on phones, some of us love apple and some of us love Samsung and even the old-timers just want a Nokia brick.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6082493][color=#FFFFFF]What's the worst that could happen in 2020?[/color][/url] - [mention=183072]
Mr Kewl is back in the news once again with a new question full of fun and entertaining answers. Since Covid-19 already happened in 2020, what would be worse that could happen? Well, if you can answer that question make sure you go and comment on the thread and see if you are similar to other members of the site.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6082493][color=#FFFFFF]Do you sleep naked? Why or why not?[/color][/url] - [mention=3459543]
Sleeping, we all have different habits when it comes to sleeping, some people wear socks some people think that is forbidden some people sleep with clothes and some just sleep butt naked, but what do you do? Do you do something unique and different from everyone else? If you do let us know in the flavoral's thread.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Contests & Giveaways[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6083198][color=#FFFFFF]Mr Kewl's 1500 Bytes Giveaway![/color][/url] - [mention=183072]
Another mention for the great guy Mr Kewl, he is giving away to one very lucky winner 1,500 bytes! Anyone can get a chance to win these bytes and maybe even use them to make even more bytes by gambling them or even using them to buy a service they would like.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6079865][color=#FFFFFF]$50 BTC Giveway | Anybody Can Enter![/color][/url] - [mention=4204574]
Are you looking to get some bitcoin but don't have anything in your wallet to spare? Well look no more because a member known as exsile is giving you the chance to win a nice stack of $50 in bitcoin, The giveaway ends on the 20th of June so you will have plenty of time to get your chance to win.
[/list]

[color=transparent]       [/color][/size][/font]

[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/technews-invisible.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Anonymous Is Back[/color][/b]
After years of silence following George Floyd 's murder, Anonymous has come to appear again. Their main purpose is to expose police around the world to "many crimes." After an apparent DDoS attack the Minneapolis Police Department website was taken offline for a period of time. There was also a breach of email addresses and passwords in a database claiming to be police department possession. As for now, there has been no evidence that the servers of the police department servers have been breached, and just a mixture of older breaches. A page for the United Nations agency has been defaced and replaced with George Floyd's image, "REST IN POWER GEROGE FLYOD!”[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.bbc.com/news/technology-52879000] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]A Wallpaper That Could Brick Your Phone[/color][/b]
A recent photo circulating social media has been the main culprit of many Android phones bricking and being unable to recover. The picture includes a lake, sunset, and a shoreline with some trees that have not been officially identified as the bug that is present. Dylan Roussel, a developer and Pen Testers, said, “As digital photographs have improved in quality, phones need to check what the image ‘color space’ is to work how to display it properly. For now, Android phone users are cautioned not to set the photo as their wallpaper, because there is a moderate risk that the phone will be bricked.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.bbc.com/news/technology-52891650] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]A New Streaming Device from Google[/color][/b]
Google could be close launching its next TV streaming device, codenamed "Sabrina." The configuration will be a dongle, a Chromecast Ultra-like size, a screen, and an interface that will phase out the user-friendly Chromecast. XDA Developers obtained access to the device's images and marketing video from a trusted Android developer, dating back to October 2019. Reports say the device, along with other Google devices, will be branded under Nest and will have a price tag of $80.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.theverge.com/2020/6/2/21278232/google-android-tv-streaming-device-new-leak-images-video-remote] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=4570721][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/animenews-megane.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Food Wars! Shokugeki no Soma Anime Resumes on July 3 After COVID-19 Delay[/color][/b]
The fifth season of "Food Wars!  Shokugeki no Soma" will be resuming its series on July 3. The series was put on a temporary pause back in mid-April due to the coronavirus. The anime aired its first episode on April 10. If you are not caught up in the latest season, now is a good time to binge-watch the previous seasons! [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-05-29/food-wars-shokugeki-no-soma-anime-resumes-on-july-3-after-covid-19-delay/.160075]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]'Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? Infinite Combate' Game Delayed to Summer in West[/color][/b]
The popular anime, "Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon?" was supposed to be getting a game ported to the west this year, but due to the coronavirus, just like many things this year, it has been postponed until a later date. There has been no set date on when the game will release, but PQube, one of the teams working on the game, announced on their Twitter that the game will be released this summer. When available, the game will be released on the Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, and via Steam on the PC.

For those who enjoy a special edition of games, the game will be releasing a "Collector's Edition" version of the game, but these will only be available for the Switch and PS4 versions of the game. Included in the collector's edition version of the game will be additional soundtracks, a physical artbook, a pillowcase of Hestia, six art cards, and a box for the set of cards. Yep, you read that right. If you wanted a Hestia body pillowcase, now is the time to get one.

Sticking to the style of most Japanese games these days, the game will consist of dungeon-crawling, role-playing fighting, and visual novel-style story. If you've seen the first season of the anime, the game will take place around those events and new content will be featured too.

If you are tired of story mode, you will be able to participate in newly generated "extra dungeons" which are periodically updated for your enjoyment and "date events" where you can have fun with your favorite characters. Yes, you weirdos, you can finally go on a date with your favorite character from the anime! [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-05-29/is-it-wrong-to-try-to-pick-up-girls-in-a-dungeon-infinite-combate-game-delayed-to-summer-in-west/.160070]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Spike Chunsoft Reveals New Re:Zero Game for PS4, Switch, PC[/color][/b]
Spike Chunsoft, a Japanese video game development company will be working on a brand new game based on the "Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World-" series. The game will be released for the PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, and PC via Steam this winter!

The game's story will revolve around the first season where Subaru meets Rem, Ram, and Emilia for the first time. There is no information on when the Americas will be getting the game, but Amazon U.K. already has a [url=https://www.amazon.co.uk//dp/B08974G2TY/]listing[/url] which hints that it might be coming to the U.K. before it does the Americas.

If you are not into chibi-style characters, which means short and a little bit chubby style art, you most likely will not like this game since the art revolves around that when you are in the open-world. From the screenshots provided, the game looks like it will be similar to any modern-day Japanese game, just like how 'Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? Infinite Combate' was described in this week's edition of the news.

Meaning, there will be a mixture of open-world and some roleplaying experience, as well as a visual novel storyline. So while you'll be getting the chibi-style characters in the open world, the storyline will have original artwork of the characters like you would see in the anime. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-05-29/spike-chunsoft-reveals-new-re-zero-game-for-ps4-switch-pc/.160047]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Azur Lane: Crosswave Game Gets Switch Version on September 17[/color][/b]
This September, expect a brand new Azur Lane game to be hitting stores near you. If you are not familiar with the Azur Lane series, it is a very popular gacha mobile game. What is a gacha mobile game? Gacha mobile games are typically Japanese style games where the incentive is to keep spending money to get better items within a game. Sort of like the term, "pay-to-win" in modern-day MMO's.

Azur Lane: Crosswave will be coming to the Nintendo Switch on September 17 of this year. The game is based on the mobile version of the game, which you can download in the app store on Android and iPhone.

You have an arsenal of boats from the WWII era. These boats are depicted by cute anime girls. Boats from the Allied Forces and the Axis Powers (Japan, England, U.S., and Germany specifically for this game) can be collected.

The game uses a turn-based combat system. You can take a look at the gameplay [url=https://youtu.be/nZwZJfmO0bo]here[/url]. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-05-28/azur-lane-crosswave-game-gets-switch-version-on-september-17/.160028]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color][/size][/font]
